MEMBERSHIP
Interested in Joining Team Wonder?
Our talented staff members are comfortable working outdoors, engaging with and inspiring our WONDERful guests and volunteers, and collaborating to support a nurturing environment for the animals in our care.
We list our open positions on Indeed.com. Set an alert for Wonder Gardens to stay updated on openings in:
Guest Services
Animal Care
Horticulture
Education
Operations
Development
Events
Visit Us!
27180 Old 41 Road
Bonita Springs, FL
34135-5405
239-992-2591
© 2025 Bonita Wonder Gardens. All Rights Reserved. |

MEMBERSHIP
Membership
Become A Member Today!
now offering digital membership cards!
Click Here to download your digital card
MEMBERSHIP PRICES EFFECTIVE JUNE 1, 2024
Become a member at the Wonder Gardens and help us continue our mission to offer our community and its visitors an educational, recreational, environmental and historical resource.
MEMBERSHIP INCLUDES:
Unlimited FREE admission for one full year
20% off Wonder Shoppe (gift shop) purchases
FREE
or reduced admission to over 200 participating nature centers and over 300 participating botanical gardens nationwide (many in Florida)
Membership Levels:
General
–
$75  One Individual
Plus One
–
$100 Two Individuals
Family – $125 Two Adults and up to 6 children (under 18)
Extended Family –
$185 Four Adults and up to 6 children (under 18)
All memberships include reciprocal agreements with the following organizations:
Association of Nature Center Administrators
American Horticultural Society
Plus One ($100 level) memberships and above include reciprocal agreements with the above organizations:
North American Reciprocal Museum Association
Membership

MEMBERSHIP
Wonderful
Private Events
FILL OUT THE FORM BELOW FOR
MORE INFORMATION!
We’d love to be your favorite venue! We have held many weddings, parties, meetings and galas at the gardens!
Please fill out the form below completely. Every event is ‘custom’ and we do not give out estimates until we receive all required information.  You will see a confirmation on the screen once you hit submit.
We will get back to you as soon as it is possible. We have a large interest in our venue and answer each request in the order received. We look forward to hearing from you.
For any additional questions or concerns, please email our events coordinator at
[email protected]
*Please note: Photography sessions must be booked in advance.

MEMBERSHIP
Board of directors
Members of the community established Bonita Wonder Gardens as a 501(c)(3) not-for-profit organization in September 2014 with the mission to purchase, operate, and enhance The Wonder Gardens, an historic attraction founded in 1936. The non-profit purchased The Wonder Gardens in April 2015.
The Wonder Gardens is dedicated to offering our community and its visitors an educational, recreational, environmental, and historical resource.
Our Board of Directors generously volunteer their time to provide stewardship for the organization:
Dr. Wendy Arsenault, DVM – Board Chair
Eileen Tasso – Secretary
Larry Vars – Treasurer
Diane Ewing
Mike Hammond
Dr. Damien Lin, VMD
Julie Pedretti
Angela Swanepoel
Dr. Alan White
Marjo White

MEMBERSHIP
Meet Our
Leadership Team
The Wonder Gardens team aspires to create a wonderful guest experience through exhibiting an astonishing zoological, educational, botanical environment while taking the upmost care of our rescued animal friends.
Neil Anderson
President & CEO
Jessica White
Operations Manager
Kaitlyn Henry
Director of Living Collections
Katie Grimes
Education & Volunteer Manager
Michelle Stromberg Ohlhaber
Development & Marketing Manager
“I spent about 1.5 hours here and I loved all the greenery amongst the variety of interesting animals. This is a great place for anyone! I came alone and had a blast taking photos and constantly found myself going back to see the huge alligators and the green house like structures were so pretty! Had to snag myself a souvenir at the end for sure.”
Diane Kelly
“I really enjoyed the visit. They have many wonderful enclosures, animals to see, and three types of feed. This is is a nice place to visit with or without kids..”
Lori Gardner
“Small, but incredibly sweet. Great place to bring your children and let them get up close and personal to a variety of animals. Laid out beautifully, a lovely place to stroll for a few hours.”
Miriam Duval
“I spent about 1.5 hours here and I loved all the greenery amongst the variety of interesting animals. This is a great place for anyone! I came alone and had a blast taking photos and constantly found myself going back to see the huge alligators and the green house like structures were so pretty! Had to snag myself a souvenir at the end for sure.”
Diane Kelly
“I really enjoyed the visit. They have many wonderful enclosures, animals to see, and three types of feed. This is is a nice place to visit with or without kids..”
Lori Gardner
“Small, but incredibly sweet. Great place to bring your children and let them get up close and personal to a variety of animals. Laid out beautifully, a lovely place to stroll for a few hours.”
Miriam Duval

Celebrating 90 Years of Wonder!
Wonder Gardens
27180 Old 41 Rd, Bonita Springs, FL, United States
A Birthday Celebration Celebrating 90 years of Wonder!
A captivating evening set throughout the Wonder Gardensʼ lush grounds.  Enjoy sumptuous bites from local restaurants, live entertainment, animal encounters, our Fund the Future Paddle Raise, mystery auction items, and a special wine pull. The evening is designed to engage both legacy supporters and a new generation of donors.
$250.00 – $500.00
February 2026
Sun
1
Featured
February 1, 2026 @ 11:00 am
-
3:00 pm
Celebrating 90 Years of Wonder – Family Fun Day
Wonder Gardens
27180 Old 41 Rd, Bonita Springs, FL, United States
A vibrant, all-ages community celebration! A fun-filled day featuring hands-on
activities, local entertainment, vendors, games, animal interactions, delicious
food and refreshments.
Family Fun Day is designed to spark wonder in the next generation while honoring the values that have sustained the Wonder Gardens for nearly a century.
$25.00 – $50.00
